title: Effect of simulation-based zoom learning on clinical decision-making among undergraduate nursing students and experiences of students and instructors: A mixed methods study
content:
Publication date: 15 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 9

Author(s): Carmen Wing Han Chan, Fiona Wing Ki Tang, Ho Yu Cheng, Ka Ming Chow, Zoe Ching Man Kwok, Caixia Li, Yuli Zang, Sek Ying Chair
